alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; City and Borough of Wrangell; City of Hyder; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 21 at 9:33PM AKST until December 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT THURSDAY NIGHT TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches except up to 20 inches near Hyder. * WHERE...Southern half of Southeast Alaska including areas around Petersburg, Kake, Port Alexander, Craig, Klawock, Hydaburg, Coffman Cove, Thorne Bay, Wrangell, Ketchikan, Hyder, and Metlakatla. * WHEN...From midnight Thursday night to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow will begin to mix with rain in the early hours on Saturday making snow hard to remove. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall rates will be during the daylight hours on Friday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
